alert.note: Alert for Lawrence (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 03 at 2:41AM CST until February 05 at 9:16PM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Big Nance Creek AT Courtland affecting Lawrence County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING TO LATE SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Nance Creek AT Courtland. * WHEN...From Friday morning to late Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Water begins to cover roads south of downtown Courtland. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:30 AM CST Thursday the stage was 3.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow morning and crest of 17.0 feet around midnight on Friday. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 17.0 feet on 07/10/1940. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 245 PM CST.
